RawLine: QINFO_30109,向{color=#cc0000}大福鐵舖{/color}的{color=#cc0000}蘇大福{/color}詢問是否有玉珮的消息。（小溪村）,向{color=#cc0000}大福铁铺{/color}的{color=#cc0000}苏大福{/color}询问是否有玉珮的消息。（小溪村）

Items.mt: Ask Su Daifu of Daifu Iron Shop if he has any news of the jade pendant. (Xiaoxi Village)
